title: 20+ Best Fairytale Fonts for Fantastical Designs
description: If you're looking for all of the best fairytale fonts, then check this roundup! We list only the fantastical, whimsical and magical fonts for your storybooks.
author: Jacob Cass
excerpt: If you're looking for all of the best fairytale fonts, then check this roundup! We list only the fantastical, whimsical and magical fonts for your storybooks.
text: Are you looking for the best fairytale fonts? Whether you’re searching for a classic fairy tale font or a modern sans serif, for your design projects, then we’ve got you covered! Similar to fantasy fonts and whimsical fonts, the characteristics of the fairytale typefaces make them perfect for creating captivating content that stands out. A typeface with a broad range of features, stylistic alternates and a schematic color pattern with full-feature accessibility is vital to create magical project designs that kids enjoy the most. The fonts’ sleek and contemporary appearances make them appropriate for any design project. Each of these fonts has a classic aesthetic that is likely to go well with your business and marketing materials. They come in a variety of styles and colors, so you can choose the perfect one for your requirements. The letters of fairy tale fonts have been developed with a bouncy baseline and special character set in a range of sizes and shapes for desktops, laptops, MacBooks, mobile phones, and other electronic devices. Thanks to its advanced flexible features, this font category is suitable for any digital project. This article includes some of the most appropriate fonts that you might require. Also see our compilation of Disney fonts and charming fonts. UNLIMITED DOWNLOADS: 50 Million+ Fonts & Design Assets Download all the Fairytale Fonts you need and many other design elements, available for a monthly subscription by subscribing to Envato Elements. The subscription costs $16.50 per month and gives you unlimited access to a massive and growing library of over 50 million items that can be downloaded as often as you need (stock effect & element packs too)! 20+ Best Fairytale Fonts (Fantasy Storybook Fonts) 1. Fairytales Script Font Fairytales is an inspiring font, perfect for fantasy storybooks and magical projects. Just like its name, this font is a great option for story-based themes. This commercially licensed font comes in OTF and TTF formats with instant download and free updates. It is accessible in Adobe Photoshop, InDesign, Illustrator, and Microsoft Word. 2. Stealth Screen This digital-style font has a gorgeous texture that makes it perfect for headlines, logos, typographical quotes, and other designs with a flashy touch. Stealth Screen display font comes up with dual case letters, alternates glyphs, international glyphs, standard characters, numbers, punctuations, and ligatures. It is available in OTF, TTF, and web font formats. 3. Fairytales Bonus This display typeface is inspired by classic ads and movie posters. It comes with 231 glyphs and alternate characters that are accessible by Adobe Illustrator and InDesign. A bonus of this font is that it contains 10 hand-drawn vector animal illustrations to enhance your project. This typeface is ideal for projects like headlines, badges, wedding invites, greeting cards, signatures, etc. The synergistic vintage vibes and the OpenType features of this font create a harmonic and attractive design. It is available in multiple file formats like OTF, TTF, hand-drawn (Illustrator), and EPS (Vector). 4. Fairytales Script This organic handmade typeface has a beautiful dancing baseline style, suitable for projects like headings, logotypes, wedding invites, merchandise, letterheads, signature, labels, news headlines, posters, badges, and more. Its features include swashes, lowercase characters, and availability in OTF and TTF file versions. It supports most Western languages. 5. Fairy Tail This Fairy Tail display font is ideal for a wonderland design. This cartoonish font is used in a wide range of illustrations for children, like adventures, games, parties, events, etc. You can download this font in OTF, TTF, and WOFF file formats. This font is available in a regular style along with features such as upper and lower case alphabets, glyphs, alternates, ligatures, numerals, and punctuation. This font has multilingual support and accessibility through Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator. 6. Langlock Langlock is a magical typeface designed by Ikiiko. This serif font is inspired by classical fairytales of princes, princesses, and wizards. This display font is perfect for both classic and vintage book covers, magic stories, flyer designs, poster designs, and inspirational quotes with simple yet stylish text that helps create a dreamy fairytale background image. The features of this font include numeric characters, punctuation, both upper and lowercase letters, alternates, and stylistic sets. This multilingual font works on both PC and Mac in OTF and TTF files. 7. Wonder Magic This fairytale font has lovely visuals and helps create a magical design with a natural look. This serif font is all set to design themed party designs and invites that you might have wished to make. This creative font is available with dual-case letters, symbols, punctuation, numerals, ligatures, and alternates and is downloadable in OTF, WOFF, WOFF2, and TTF formats with multilingual support. 8. Tumbled Serif Tumbled Serif is a new Envato family font that casts a magical spell on your designs. This fancy serif-based font simultaneously ensures both beauty and readability. The characteristics of this typeface are accessible in Adobe (Photoshop, InDesign, and Illustrator) and Microsoft Word. It is commercially licensed and available in OTF and TTF formats. You can instantly download this amazing font and get a free update. 9. Fairy tale Introducing a beautiful and elegant font with a hollow style by Salt & Pepper Designs! This cute font is accessible through all software without installing any additional design program. This font is licensed with free updates. You’ll get an instant download of the font in OTF, TTF, or web font formats, such as EOT, SVG, WOFF, and WOFF2. 10. Darthon Here’s another font with a casual display, suitable for logos, labels, magazines, book covers, greeting cards, wedding cards, advertisements, product packaging, stationery, book covers, fashion, makeup, and other formal designs. This font has ballpoint-style strokes, features, numerals, punctuation, ligatures, alternates, and dual-case letters. This PUA-encoded font offers multilingual support. It is fully accessible through Adobe and CorelDraw design software, allowing access to all of the glyphs. 11. Anigira This script display font is inspired by magic shows, which makes it appropriate for ads, branding, logos, invitations, stationery items, social media posts, merchandise designs, packaging, blog titles, game titles, cover pages of books and magazines, and other projects. This magical display is also helpful in creating designs with some amazing background effects. It is very handy for beginners to design any project they want. It offers multilingual support; you can download it in OTF, TTF, and WOFF files. 12. Polandic This authentic font with a handcrafted brush textural vibe is perfect for designing signatures, logos, typography, quotes, magazines and book covers, website headlines, stationery, flyers, product packaging, clothing, branding, etc. It is available in Vector (OTF and TTF), SVG (OTF), and web font formats. You can use SVG format in Photoshop CC 2017, CC 2018, or an updated version. 13. Nightwish This authentic font with a handcrafted brush textural vibe is perfect for designing signatures, logos, typography, quotes, magazines and book covers, website headlines, stationery, flyers, product packaging, clothing, branding, etc. It is available in Vector (OTF and TTF), SVG (OTF), and web font formats. You can use SVG format in Photoshop CC 2017, CC 2018, or an updated version. 14. Brownie Fox This classy vintage fairytale typeface is an ideal choice for making fairytale books, storybook covers, vintage posters, product packaging, magazines, headers, posters, quotes, kids’ illustrations, etc. This decorative font comprises dual-case letters, numeric, punctuation, alternates, swashes, and multilingual support. The OTF and TTF file formats are useful in both PC and Mac environments. 15. Panikos Next up is Panikos, a fancy font that helps create fairyland projects, which makes it a good choice for several project designs and events. This magical serif font offers features such as upper and lowercase letters, symbols, punctuation, numerals, ligatures, and alternates. This multilingual font is available in OTF, TTF, WOFF, and WOFF2 file formats. 16. Pristyne This alluring script font has standard characters that make it appropriate to create eye-catching designs for book covers, magazines, logos, t-shirts, posters, flyers, baby products, fashion products, comics, quotations, and other creative designs. The features of this typeface include numerals, punctuation, ligatures, international glyphs, dual case letters, and availability in OTF, TTF, and web font formats. 17. The Fairy Tale Font Let’s present another font, The Fairytale Font, a funky handwritten font family that includes catchphrases, dingbats, vector graphic files, and alternates for uppercase and lowercase glyphs. In addition, it has three display typefaces in one font with tons of extras. Using this fairytale typeface, you can design greeting cards, flyers, posters, and other projects designed with modern concepts. This font is available in two sets, one each for uppercase and lowercase alternates. A glyph panel is required to use these alternates. Other features include OTF, TTF files, catchphrases, more than 40 dingbats, fairytale themes, an extra cheat sheet, JPEG and EPS files, a preview of vector sets, and more than 60 vector graphic elements. You’ll need software like Adobe Illustrator or Photoshop CC to access the font features. 18. Fairytale Florals The Fairytale Florals is available with a monogram set to create a hand-drawn design with pastel colors. It’s a versatile flowered font with incredible floral design elements that contain four sets of monograms, initials, letters, and individual floral design elements. This font is a perfect choice for logos, cover pages of books, packaging, invitations, greeting cards, wedding cards, and more. This font is all black, but it can be recolored in a design program. This font doesn’t belong to any font family; rather, it has a separate pattern of letter graphics. The features of this font include 4 sets of uppercase characters, 4 different typographic symbols, 4 different sets of numbers from 0 to 9, and 12 individual floral design elements. Each element of this font is available in PSD, EPS, AI, and PNG file formats. 19. Mayblossom The Mayblossom font family is designed by David Kerkhoff. This display font is named after an old French Fairytale (named The Princess Mayblossom), which is inspired by the tale of Sleeping Beauty. This font comprises two styles. Mayblossom is a fairytale font, which has been created with a magic wand and unicorn hair core. Moreover, the typeface comes with 12 lovely fairies. If you want to create a light fairy magical art sprinkled with shiny and colorful visuals, Mayblossom is likely to be your choice. 20. Princess David Phillips and Traci Daberko are the designers of the Princess font family. If we take a look at the Princess font, we’ll find it informal with a relaxed feel. This delicate handwritten font is ideal for fashion and festive designs. This attractive typeface comprises accented characters, numerals, punctuation, and symbols, in addition to a collection of 11 unique ligatures. This typeface gives a feeling of an inspiring fairytale, so it works excellently whenever you want to create unique design magic. Best Fairytale Fonts Summary To give the projects a sense of elegance and a fairytale theme, we’ve included fonts with vintage, modern, and classical appearances. The text of these fonts is the most appealing with their trendy letter styles. We recommend that you try these typefaces because they might help you create a masterpiece. Romantic Fonts Best Witch Fonts Best Alien Fonts Best Valentine’s Day Fonts Frequently Asked Questions Which font looks magical? Fonts like Langlock, and Wonder Magic evoke a magical feel with their whimsical designs. Mayblossom also captures enchanting aesthetics, perfect for fairy tale themes. What is a whimsical font? Whimsical fonts are playful and imaginative, ranging from lighthearted and childlike to dark and mystical. These vintage and fantasy-inspired typefaces add a sense of wonder, fun, and magic to any design project. What font is aesthetic? Aesthetic fonts often feature elegant, unique designs that enhance visual appeal. Fonts like Anigira, and Tumbled Serif embody aesthetic qualities, combining beautiful letterforms with whimsical themes to create enchanting designs.
html:
Are you looking for the best fairytale fonts? Whether you’re searching for a classic fairy tale font or a modern sans serif, for your design projects, then we’ve got you covered!

Similar to fantasy fonts and whimsical fonts, the characteristics of the fairytale typefaces make them perfect for creating captivating content that stands out.

A typeface with a broad range of features, stylistic alternates and a schematic color pattern with full-feature accessibility is vital to create magical project designs that kids enjoy the most.

The fonts’ sleek and contemporary appearances make them appropriate for any design project. Each of these fonts has a classic aesthetic that is likely to go well with your business and marketing materials.

They come in a variety of styles and colors, so you can choose the perfect one for your requirements. The letters of fairy tale fonts have been developed with a bouncy baseline and special character set in a range of sizes and shapes for desktops, laptops, MacBooks, mobile phones, and other electronic devices.

Thanks to its advanced flexible features, this font category is suitable for any digital project. This article includes some of the most appropriate fonts that you might require.

Also see our compilation of Disney fonts and charming fonts.

UNLIMITED DOWNLOADS: 50 Million+ Fonts & Design Assets

Download all the Fairytale Fonts you need and many other design elements, available for a monthly subscription by subscribing to Envato Elements. The subscription costs $16.50 per month and gives you unlimited access to a massive and growing library of over 50 million items that can be downloaded as often as you need (stock effect & element packs too)!

20+ Best Fairytale Fonts (Fantasy Storybook Fonts)

1. Fairytales Script Font

Fairytales is an inspiring font, perfect for fantasy storybooks and magical projects. Just like its name, this font is a great option for story-based themes.

This commercially licensed font comes in OTF and TTF formats with instant download and free updates.

It is accessible in Adobe Photoshop, InDesign, Illustrator, and Microsoft Word.

2. Stealth Screen

This digital-style font has a gorgeous texture that makes it perfect for headlines, logos, typographical quotes, and other designs with a flashy touch.

Stealth Screen display font comes up with dual case letters, alternates glyphs, international glyphs, standard characters, numbers, punctuations, and ligatures. It is available in OTF, TTF, and web font formats.

3. Fairytales Bonus

This display typeface is inspired by classic ads and movie posters.

It comes with 231 glyphs and alternate characters that are accessible by Adobe Illustrator and InDesign.

A bonus of this font is that it contains 10 hand-drawn vector animal illustrations to enhance your project.

This typeface is ideal for projects like headlines, badges, wedding invites, greeting cards, signatures, etc.

The synergistic vintage vibes and the OpenType features of this font create a harmonic and attractive design.

It is available in multiple file formats like OTF, TTF, hand-drawn (Illustrator), and EPS (Vector).

4. Fairytales Script

This organic handmade typeface has a beautiful dancing baseline style, suitable for projects like headings, logotypes, wedding invites, merchandise, letterheads, signature, labels, news headlines, posters, badges, and more.

Its features include swashes, lowercase characters, and availability in OTF and TTF file versions.

It supports most Western languages.

5. Fairy Tail

This Fairy Tail display font is ideal for a wonderland design.

This cartoonish font is used in a wide range of illustrations for children, like adventures, games, parties, events, etc.

You can download this font in OTF, TTF, and WOFF file formats. This font is available in a regular style along with features such as upper and lower case alphabets, glyphs, alternates, ligatures, numerals, and punctuation.

This font has multilingual support and accessibility through Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator.

6. Langlock

Langlock is a magical typeface designed by Ikiiko. This serif font is inspired by classical fairytales of princes, princesses, and wizards.

This display font is perfect for both classic and vintage book covers, magic stories, flyer designs, poster designs, and inspirational quotes with simple yet stylish text that helps create a dreamy fairytale background image.

The features of this font include numeric characters, punctuation, both upper and lowercase letters, alternates, and stylistic sets.

This multilingual font works on both PC and Mac in OTF and TTF files.

7. Wonder Magic

This fairytale font has lovely visuals and helps create a magical design with a natural look.

This serif font is all set to design themed party designs and invites that you might have wished to make.

This creative font is available with dual-case letters, symbols, punctuation, numerals, ligatures, and alternates and is downloadable in OTF, WOFF, WOFF2, and TTF formats with multilingual support.

8. Tumbled Serif

Tumbled Serif is a new Envato family font that casts a magical spell on your designs.

This fancy serif-based font simultaneously ensures both beauty and readability. The characteristics of this typeface are accessible in Adobe (Photoshop, InDesign, and Illustrator) and Microsoft Word.

It is commercially licensed and available in OTF and TTF formats. You can instantly download this amazing font and get a free update.

9. Fairy tale

Introducing a beautiful and elegant font with a hollow style by Salt & Pepper Designs! This cute font is accessible through all software without installing any additional design program.

This font is licensed with free updates. You’ll get an instant download of the font in OTF, TTF, or web font formats, such as EOT, SVG, WOFF, and WOFF2.

10. Darthon

Here’s another font with a casual display, suitable for logos, labels, magazines, book covers, greeting cards, wedding cards, advertisements, product packaging, stationery, book covers, fashion, makeup, and other formal designs.

This font has ballpoint-style strokes, features, numerals, punctuation, ligatures, alternates, and dual-case letters.

This PUA-encoded font offers multilingual support.

It is fully accessible through Adobe and CorelDraw design software, allowing access to all of the glyphs.

11. Anigira

This script display font is inspired by magic shows, which makes it appropriate for ads, branding, logos, invitations, stationery items, social media posts, merchandise designs, packaging, blog titles, game titles, cover pages of books and magazines, and other projects.

This magical display is also helpful in creating designs with some amazing background effects.

It is very handy for beginners to design any project they want.

It offers multilingual support; you can download it in OTF, TTF, and WOFF files.

12. Polandic

This authentic font with a handcrafted brush textural vibe is perfect for designing signatures, logos, typography, quotes, magazines and book covers, website headlines, stationery, flyers, product packaging, clothing, branding, etc.

It is available in Vector (OTF and TTF), SVG (OTF), and web font formats. You can use SVG format in Photoshop CC 2017, CC 2018, or an updated version.

13. Nightwish

This authentic font with a handcrafted brush textural vibe is perfect for designing signatures, logos, typography, quotes, magazines and book covers, website headlines, stationery, flyers, product packaging, clothing, branding, etc.

It is available in Vector (OTF and TTF), SVG (OTF), and web font formats.

You can use SVG format in Photoshop CC 2017, CC 2018, or an updated version.

14. Brownie Fox

This classy vintage fairytale typeface is an ideal choice for making fairytale books, storybook covers, vintage posters, product packaging, magazines, headers, posters, quotes, kids’ illustrations, etc.

This decorative font comprises dual-case letters, numeric, punctuation, alternates, swashes, and multilingual support.

The OTF and TTF file formats are useful in both PC and Mac environments.

15. Panikos

Next up is Panikos, a fancy font that helps create fairyland projects, which makes it a good choice for several project designs and events.

This magical serif font offers features such as upper and lowercase letters, symbols, punctuation, numerals, ligatures, and alternates.

This multilingual font is available in OTF, TTF, WOFF, and WOFF2 file formats.

16. Pristyne

This alluring script font has standard characters that make it appropriate to create eye-catching designs for book covers, magazines, logos, t-shirts, posters, flyers, baby products, fashion products, comics, quotations, and other creative designs.

The features of this typeface include numerals, punctuation, ligatures, international glyphs, dual case letters, and availability in OTF, TTF, and web font formats.

17. The Fairy Tale Font

Let’s present another font, The Fairytale Font, a funky handwritten font family that includes catchphrases, dingbats, vector graphic files, and alternates for uppercase and lowercase glyphs. In addition, it has three display typefaces in one font with tons of extras.

Using this fairytale typeface, you can design greeting cards, flyers, posters, and other projects designed with modern concepts.

This font is available in two sets, one each for uppercase and lowercase alternates. A glyph panel is required to use these alternates.

Other features include OTF, TTF files, catchphrases, more than 40 dingbats, fairytale themes, an extra cheat sheet, JPEG and EPS files, a preview of vector sets, and more than 60 vector graphic elements.

You’ll need software like Adobe Illustrator or Photoshop CC to access the font features.

18. Fairytale Florals

The Fairytale Florals is available with a monogram set to create a hand-drawn design with pastel colors.

It’s a versatile flowered font with incredible floral design elements that contain four sets of monograms, initials, letters, and individual floral design elements.

This font is a perfect choice for logos, cover pages of books, packaging, invitations, greeting cards, wedding cards, and more.

This font is all black, but it can be recolored in a design program.

This font doesn’t belong to any font family; rather, it has a separate pattern of letter graphics.

The features of this font include 4 sets of uppercase characters, 4 different typographic symbols, 4 different sets of numbers from 0 to 9, and 12 individual floral design elements. Each element of this font is available in PSD, EPS, AI, and PNG file formats.

19. Mayblossom

The Mayblossom font family is designed by David Kerkhoff. This display font is named after an old French Fairytale (named The Princess Mayblossom), which is inspired by the tale of Sleeping Beauty.

This font comprises two styles.

Mayblossom is a fairytale font, which has been created with a magic wand and unicorn hair core.

Moreover, the typeface comes with 12 lovely fairies.

If you want to create a light fairy magical art sprinkled with shiny and colorful visuals, Mayblossom is likely to be your choice.

20. Princess

David Phillips and Traci Daberko are the designers of the Princess font family.

If we take a look at the Princess font, we’ll find it informal with a relaxed feel.

This delicate handwritten font is ideal for fashion and festive designs. This attractive typeface comprises accented characters, numerals, punctuation, and symbols, in addition to a collection of 11 unique ligatures.

This typeface gives a feeling of an inspiring fairytale, so it works excellently whenever you want to create unique design magic.

Best Fairytale Fonts Summary

To give the projects a sense of elegance and a fairytale theme, we’ve included fonts with vintage, modern, and classical appearances.

The text of these fonts is the most appealing with their trendy letter styles.

We recommend that you try these typefaces because they might help you create a masterpiece.

  • Romantic Fonts
  • Best Witch Fonts
  • Best Alien Fonts
  • Best Valentine’s Day Fonts

Frequently Asked Questions

Which font looks magical?

Fonts like Langlock, and Wonder Magic evoke a magical feel with their whimsical designs. Mayblossom also captures enchanting aesthetics, perfect for fairy tale themes.

What is a whimsical font?

Whimsical fonts are playful and imaginative, ranging from lighthearted and childlike to dark and mystical. These vintage and fantasy-inspired typefaces add a sense of wonder, fun, and magic to any design project.

What font is aesthetic?

Aesthetic fonts often feature elegant, unique designs that enhance visual appeal. Fonts like Anigira, and Tumbled Serif embody aesthetic qualities, combining beautiful letterforms with whimsical themes to create enchanting designs.
